alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 8:26AM CST until January 12 at 9:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Rankin County in central Mississippi... North central Simpson County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Smith County in central Mississippi... Eastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Scott County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 930 AM CST. * At 826 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pelahatchie, or 9 miles west of Morton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Morton, Branch, Leesburg, and Forkville around 830 AM CST. Hillsboro and Ludlow around 840 AM CST. Harperville and Lena around 845 AM CST. Walnut Grove, Tuscola, and Steele around 850 AM CST. Standing Pine around 855 AM CST. Sebastopol and Madden around 900 AM CST. Edinburg around 910 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for central and east central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Simpson; Smith
